scripts.libs: mkdir -p src/libs/bs && cp -R node_modules/bootstrap/dist/* src/libs/bs && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js src/libs && cp node_modules/knockout/build/output/knockout-latest.js src/libs && cp node_modules/q/q.js src/libs
scripts.lint: yarn run css && yarn run js
scripts.minify: mkdir -p dist && html-minifier -c html-minifier.conf dist/index.process.html -o dist/index.html && rm dist/index.process.html
scripts.html: yarn run process && yarn run minify
